name: Sogamo
overview:
Sogamo, which stands for Social Games Monetization, aims to help Facebook game developers earn more money by understanding their players better. The platform seeks to lighten the workload of game developers in creating the virtual economy inside their games. According to each player’s in-game habits, Sogamo profiles players individually and customizes the game sales prompts according to each player to enhance revenue generation.

By better understanding their players, Sogamo helps game publisher improve their decision making and maximize revenue efficiency.

Sogamo’s clientele includes Singtel and multiple government agencies.
